events.text: Hello, Dellborg. I have heard that you need a computer part to fix the computer downstairs. I am only authorized to give you the part after you learn more about what OGSM is.
Objectives, goals, strategies and measures is a fast method used in strategic planning. This is how it works:
Objectives: You can start by defining clearly what you wish to achieve in the long term. Separate your objectives in smaller and more achievable goals.
[color=#FF0000]Remember![/color] your goals must be specific, measurable, achievable and timebound.
Strategy: Consider which steps you have to take to achieve each one of your goals and develop your strategies. You also have to consider the available resources and the timeline.
Measures: Define quantifiable metrics to measure your progress.
Very well! you are free to grab the part. It is by my side!
